name: Krizta
content: Krizta was a female Tarasin Force Adept who lived on the planet Cularin during the Clone Wars. Circa 21 BBY, while she was still a child, Krizta, her brother Trik, and a number of other Tarasin were kidnapped by the Zabrak slaver Haast Aath and taken to a slave compound on the planet Tharados. From there, Krizta and Trik were transported to the planet Kemix, where they were imprisoned aboard the capital ship Rightful Dominion. The Tarasin elder Mother Tysara hired the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents, to return Krizta and Trik to Cularin, and the agents subsequently tracked down and rescued the two Tarasin.
